Package org.zurdavid.petrinets.model

Class Transition

java.lang.Object
org.zurdavid.petrinets.model.PetrinetNode
org.zurdavid.petrinets.model.Transition
public class Transition extends PetrinetNode
The class is a data class, derived from PetrinetNode and implements properties (as well as getters and setters) which only appear in transition. A transition contains two lists:
  • preconditionArcs: arcs leading from pre-condition places to the transition.
  • postconditionArcs: arcs leading from the transition to post-condition places.

  • Constructor Details

    • Transition

      public Transition(String id)
      Nodes are only given an id when constructed. All other attributes are set later. This is due to how the pnml Parsers works. See MyPNMLParser
      Parameters:
      id - The nodes id.
